Articles.Content:
Is there a way I can cheat a career unlock to see the new tech tree or does someone out there a picture of the new tech tree? I know this seems really soon to ask to see if anyone has a picture of the new tech tree.

I have a few old personal modded parts I want to see if they still fit or I have to put it in another tree branch.

Thanks!
I haven't tested it myself but can't you see the whole tree from the start now by hovering your cursor over the nodes?

> 
> I haven't tested it myself but can't you see the whole tree from the start now by hovering your cursor over the nodes?

I don't know, I have fired up a career mode yet. I am also looking to see what parts are in a tree branch. I will fire up a career game and see.

- - - Updated - - -

Yeah its there. Wow Squad went above and beyond with this official update.

Thanks for the help guys.
whole tree is visible from the start.
How about that ladder being farther down the tech tree than the "Basic Science" node? High quality right there.
And unless I missed a liquid fuel tank all there is to power the first jet engine you get is a that small rocket tank.

> 
> And unless I missed a liquid fuel tank all there is to power the first jet engine you get is a that small rocket tank.

Correct, but I already have a nice little plane with those parts. It is kind of odd that you don't get a LF only tank until later.
